home.title: OpenEBS - We make Kubernetes storage simple.
home.description: OpenEBS makes it easy to attach storage to any Kubernetes application by abstracting all of the complex commands involved in creating robust multi-zone storage in a simple one-line command.

about.title: About OpenEBS & container attached storage (CAS)
about.description: OpenEBS is the only 100% open source Kubernetes storage solution that attaches storage to the Kubernetes container, completely run in user space.

getstarted.title: Get started with OpenEBS
getstarted.description: Get up and running with OpenEBS in under 2 minutes with our handy guide to attaching storage to any Kubernetes application.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions - OpenEBS (Kubernetes Container Attached Storage)
faq.description: Have a question about OpenEBS? Need an answer? Check out our FAQs and you should be good to go.

community.title: Open Source Community for OpenEBS - (Kubernetes Container Attached Storage)
community.description: The only 2,000-strong member community devoted to building better Kubernetes storage. We’d love to have you, too! Join us on Slack or contribute directly on GitHub!

support.title: Commerical support for OpenEBS - (Kubernetes Container Attached Storage)
support.description: List of companies providing commercial products and support around OpenEBS

privacypolicy.title: Privacy Policy - OpenEBS (Kubernetes Container Attached Storage)
privacypolicy.description: Let’s be honest: we’re not doing anything fishy with your data. But read this policy in case you want to know exactly what we are doing with it.
